{{Description|The essence of life has revived the Heart of Oasis, and the elemental lifeforms' millennia-long struggles have finally gained meaning.<br>Upon returning to the land where [[Apep]] rests, the short time spent with them re-awakens the memory of that battle.<br>Recalling that verdant healing light should help steady your adventuring steps...|Memories: "They" Too Were Once Flawless}}
'''The Realm of Beginnings''' is a [[Trounce Domain]] unlocked after completing {{Quest|What Shape Does the Self Hold}}. Players can relive their fight against the [[Guardian of Apep's Oasis]] and receive rewards.

==Enemies==
{{Card|Guardian of Apep's Oasis|type=Enemy|show_caption=1}}

==Rules==
{{Transclude|Domain|trouncerule|section=1}}

==Ley Line Disorder==
During the Revitalizing Phase, the battle objective is to protect the Heart of Oasis. Progress will be made when the constant influx of monsters is defeated and it will decrease when the Heart of Oasis is attacked. When defeated, some enemies will restore Energy for characters.
